metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6412 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In the function sbusfb_ioctl_helper() in drivers/video/fbdev/sbuslib.c in the Linux kernel through 4.15, an integer signedness error allows arbitrary information leakage for the FBIOPUTCMAP_SPARC and FBIOGETCMAP_SPARC commands.

notes.Note: sbeattie> sparc configurations only, which Ubuntu no longer enables

criterions.comment: linux-euclid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
